desc: Lists shared channel invites that have been generated or received but have not been approved by all parties

token.desc: Authentication token bearing required scopes. Tokens should be passed as an HTTP Authorization header or alternatively, as a POST parameter.

team_id.desc: Encoded team id for the workspace to retrieve invites for, required if org token is used

count.desc: Maximum number of invites to return

cursor.desc: Set to `next_cursor` returned by previous call to list items in subsequent page

invalid_arguments.desc: An invalid argument was supplied to the method.

restricted_action.desc: A team preference prevents the authenticated user from viewing shared channel invites.
